short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds UPC of a product for multiple retailers online, & displays important information about the product for resellers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UPC Finder is an extension to make any resellers' product research time more valuable.  Locate multiple UPC's within seconds, copy to your clipboard and view the last 15 copied UPC's in your history so you can easily go back if you need to.  This extension can also integrate with your Keepa subscription making researching products online even that more efficient.
